turns.content: In the above interview add more of my experience from my time at Spenmo as a Business Development Representative.

Interviewer: Can you tell us about your previous experience in sales?

Me: Yes, I have a solid background in sales and business development. My most recent role was as a Business Development Representative at Spenmo, where I was responsible for generating new business and expanding existing relationships. I implemented various strategies such as Cold calling, Email campaigns and social media outreach to reach out to potential clients. I was able to generate a significant number of leads and close several deals, resulting in a significant increase in revenue for the company. I also have experience as an Account Executive at GuestReady, where I was responsible for managing and growing a portfolio of accounts.
